title: Falling Hard
description: -- Warning: This book contains strong sexual content. Recommended 18+ -- Veronica has lost her mother and brother due to attacks by vicious beasts. When her brother was still alive, he was destined to take the throne from their dying father. But now that he's gone, Veronica must say goodbye to the man she loves, and marry Prince Benard from another kingdom. One by one the things she loves in life are taken from her, leaving her broken and wondering if she is insane. The ability to read minds surfaces even though she was tested and found to be without magic. Does she tell her family about her secret so they can use it for the good of the kingdom? Or, will she choose to use it to get revenge? ---------------------------------------------"Falling Hard" is a novella because it serves as the prelude to the full story of what happens to Veronica, Aaron, and Benard. The entire series is about the three of them as they face the challenges ahead of them. Each subsequent portion of the main story will release as a full length novel.---------------------------------------------
author: Scarlet E. Rose
